comments: a(n-1) = sum_{k=0..ceiling((n-1)/2)} P(8; n-1-k, k), n >= 1, with a(-1) = 7. These are the SW-NE diagonals in P(8; n, k), the (8, 1) Pascal triangle A093565. Observation by _Paul Barry_, Apr 29 2004. Proof via recursion relations and comparison of inputs.Pisano period lengths: 1, 3, 8, 6, 4, 24, 16, 12, 24, 12, 10, 24, 28, 48, 8, 24, 36, 24, 18, 12, ... (is this the same as A106291?). - _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 10 2012Also the sum of five consecutive Lucas numbers starting with L(-3). - _Alonso del Arte_, Sep 26 2013
